    • Constructor Detail

      • Float

        public Float()

    • Method Detail

      • forward

        public void forward​(float[][] gRe,
                    float[][] gIm)
        Performs an "in-place" 2D DFT forward transformation on the supplied data. The input signal is replaced by the associated DFT spectrum.
        Parameters:
        gRe - real part of the signal (modified)
        gIm - imaginary part of the signal (modified)

      • inverse

        public void inverse​(float[][] GRe,
                    float[][] GIm)
        Performs an "in-place" 2D DFT inverse transformation on the supplied spectrum. The input spectrum is replaced by the associated signal.
        Parameters:
        GRe - real part of the spectrum (modified)
        GIm - imaginary part of the spectrum (modified)

      • getMagnitude

        public float[][] getMagnitude​(float[][] re,
                              float[][] im)
        Calculates and returns the magnitude of the supplied complex-valued 2D data.
        Parameters:
        re - the real part of the data
        im - the imaginary part of the data
        Returns:
        a 2D array of magnitude values
